jobTitle: Enjoy Fantastic Mileage Rates as an Owner Operator Driver with Taylor Truck Line!
jobDescription: Enjoy Fantastic Mileage Rates as an Owner Operator Driver with Taylor Truck Line!  #socialGroup {  margin-bottom: 15px; } Taylor Truck Line - Kearny, New Jersey Owner Operator | Regional | Dry VanTaylor Truck Line has ideal owner operator opportunities, and we are seeking professional drivers like you to partner with us today!
